logline: A vast, empty office workspace stands as a haunting monument to human obsolescence, with dust settling on the tools of creativity and collaboration.
scene: In a sprawling, once-bustling office, rows of abandoned desks are lined up like silent sentinels. Each desk is cluttered with outdated technology: a dusty keyboard, a flickering holographic screen displaying lines of code no longer relevant. A broken coffee machine sits in the corner, its last brew forgotten amidst the remnants of human activity. Outside the tall windows, a serene skyline showcases a new world powered by ASI, oblivious to the human despair within. Sunlight filters through the glass, casting long shadows that highlight the emptiness and quiet sorrow of a civilization that once thrived but has now fallen silent.
camera: Wide angle to capture the vast emptiness and depth of the space, gradually zooming in on specific details that evoke nostalgia and loss.
lighting: Natural sunlight streaming in through the windows, mixed with the soft glow of flickering screens, creating a stark contrast between warmth and the coldness of abandonment.
productionDesign: The office should feel authentic and lived-in, with personal items left behind—sticky notes, coffee mugs, even a framed family photo—evoking a sense of longing and past purpose that is now overshadowed by the ASI advancements outside.
signatureTwist: The sheer silence of the office is interrupted only by the occasional hum of the ASI-controlled drones outside, a reminder of the world that moved on without human presence.
avoid: no visible signs of life or human interaction
